author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
This episode is sponsored by This episode is sponsored by Shopify - Go to http://shopify.com/SCB to sign up for your $1-per-month trial period.

Are Fred and George Weasley actually adopted?! 🤯
This started as a joke in our new “Theories Out of a Hat” concept—where we pull bad theories out of a hat and try to defend them—but the deeper we looked… the more unsettling it became.

From strange lines in Order of the Phoenix, to Molly Weasley’s emotional blind spots, to shocking connections involving Fabian & Gideon Prewett, Marlene McKinnon, and even Harry Potter himself, this theory uncovers a hidden pattern of found family, war-time loss, and chosen love at the heart of the Wizarding World.

This theory may have started as a joke…
…but it ends somewhere devastating.

🦆☕ Ducks go in cups.
#SuperCarlinBrothers #HarryPotter

Written by: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by: Ethan Edghill

🎟️ Through the Griffin Door LIVE Tour — Southwest 2025

title: Fred & George Are Actually Adopted?! | Harry Potter Theory
